summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Outlook AI Classifier app. Backend APIs are functional with proper authentication handling. Frontend displays correctly with responsive design and proper Microsoft OAuth integration UI. OAuth credentials not configured as expected.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 520 instead of expected 500 when MS_CLIENT_ID not configured
minor_bugs.impact: Error code differs from expected but functionality works

minor_bugs.issue: CORS preflight requests return 405 Method Not Allowed
minor_bugs.impact: May affect browser CORS handling in some scenarios

design_issues.issue: Microsoft branding text not found in specific selector test
design_issues.note: Microsoft logo is visible in login button, just text selector didn't match

passed_tests: API root endpoint returns welcome message
Health check endpoint returns healthy status
Protected endpoints properly return 401/422 for missing/invalid tokens
Login page displays correctly with Microsoft button
UI is responsive across desktop/tablet/mobile viewports
action_item_for_main_agent: OAuth credentials (MS_CLIENT_ID, MS_CLIENT_SECRET) need to be configured by user for full OAuth flow testing. Minor backend error code inconsistency could be addressed but doesn't affect functionality.
